author: NBCNews.com
title: Remembering Jean Kennedy Smith, former US ambassador and sister to JFK
description: Jean Kennedy Smith was the eighth of nine children and part of a major American political dynasty. She served as U.S Ambassador to Ireland under President Bill Clinton. She died on Wednesday at age 92.
source.name: NBC News

author: NBCNews.com
title: Black chefs on the tradition of Juneteenth and need for diversity in the food industry
description: Ahead of Juneteenth, a holiday celebrating the end of slavery in America, Black-owned restaurants and services are highlighting the underrepresented tradition of Black cooking and advocating for increased diversity in restaurant kitchens.
source.name: NBC News

title: Supreme Court blocks Trump administration’s DACA shutdown attempt
description: The Obama-era Deferred Action for Childhood Arrivals program has protected some 800,000 young Dreamers and allowed them to work and live in the U.S. The Supreme Court rejected the attempt to shut down the program in a 5 to 4 ruling.
